articles.title: Examining what might be next following Denver’s trade with Oklahoma City - Denver Stiffs
articles.description: Where do the Nuggets go from here following their trade with the Oklahoma City Thunder?
articles.content: Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reported earlier this morning the Denver Nuggets are trading JaMychal Green to the Oklahoma City Thunder in exchange for the 30th pick in next Thursdays draft. The deal als… [+3063 chars]
